name: TalkingGhost
0:
”Alexa open talking ghost”
”ghost how was your day today?”
”help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talking ghost
des:
Talking Ghost connects you with Lord Voldemort's Ghost who is the master of the dungeon. 
Every time you say a message starting with ghost, he assigns one of the ghosts in community to repeat your message in a spooky voice with some effects. 
The ghosts keep changing every time you talk and try to spook you, 
Have Fun in the Dungeon!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
